Name: asparagus seedling production, for planting | asparagus seedling, for planting | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/013:Plant propagation/0130:Plant propagation
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14670/documentation

This global dataset is a copy of the regional FR dataset, except for the following modifications.;The production volume represents the global annual production.;The geographicalCorrelation score of every pedigree matrix of was changed to '5'.;The comments below were part of the FR regional dataset.;This dataset represents the production of 1 asparagus seedling (crown) raised in a nursery during one year. From an asparagus nursery of 1 ha, seedlings for 10 ha productive asparagus fields can be obtained, i.e. a total of 250'000 seedlings are obtained from 1 ha nursery. ;PEF-Quality: data quality rating (DQR) =1.17 (i.e. excellent quality). This dataset refers to an average situation; for specific situations exchanges might differ substantially due to site specific parameters

The activity starts with soil cultivation of the field where after an establishing phase of two years seelings will be harvested for 7 years.

The inventory includes all activites of an average year in the productive phase of an asparagus field, i.e. soil cultivation, pesticide application, fertilisation and harvesting (manually). Machine infrastructure including a shed for shelter and fuel use are also considered as well as transport on farm. Inputs of fertilisers, pesticides, irrigation water are included. Direct field emissions from crop production activities (e.g. fertiliser and pesticide use) and land use change are considered. Also regarded are the first two years of the non-productive phase, i.e.planting (manually), soil cultivation (plough), fertilisation (manure) and PE foil.
From a mint nursery of 1 ha, seedlings for 12.5 ha productive mint fields can be obtained, i.e. a total of 1'388'887.5 seedlings are obtained from 1 ha nursery. Transport from the nursery to the farm is not included.
The activity ends with harvesting asparagus seedlings (crowns).
